headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher amid Strong Global Factory Demand
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Dec, 9 2025 US stock futures are pointing slightly higher this morning, with contracts tied to the S&P 500 and Nasdaq up about 0.1 percent, as investors weigh strong global factory demand against stubborn inflation worries. Taiwan just reported exports soaring 56 percent from a year ago, a surge in electronics and machinery that signals healthy demand for tech gear and industrial equipment worldwide. At the same time, the US 10 year...
